name: The Book of Mars
description:
You've heard stories about the 'Forbidden Section' of the library, and after a friend hints at it being something you need to experience...you decide to go check it out.

Little did you know that it would throw you into an Escape Room style hunt for clues as you race to save yourself from a disaster on a Mars base!

Please run this game using Google Chrome, as it will not work in Internet Explorer/Edge.
